function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shift from natural ventilation to active cooling strategies like evaporative cooling","Impact":"Loss of passive disease mitigation through natural ventilation","Mitigation":"Implement advanced air filtration and purification systems","Technologies":"Evaporative cooling, ultra-low particulate filters (ULPA)","People":"Building occupants, particularly those with respiratory problems and immune suppression","Owner":"Building designers, HVAC professionals"},{"Description":"Hurricanes, tornados, and floods leading to mold growth in buildings","Impact":"Respiratory problems, immune suppression, eye and skin irritation","Mitigation":"Implement measures to prevent and control mold growth","Technologies":"Mold-resistant materials, advanced ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory problems and immune suppression","Owner":"Building managers, maintenance teams"},{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic highlighting the importance of HVAC design and operations","Impact":"Spread of infectious diseases in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Focus on HVAC design, humidity control, and spatial configuration","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, humidity control systems, spatial design","People":"Global population in indoor environments","Owner":"Building designers, HVAC professionals"}]}
